en-US.summary: Thank a random person for their role on a movie.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask movie kudos to thank the (cast|crew) from Star Wars
Alexa, ask movie kudos who the producer was in Star Wars
Alexa, ask movie kudos who played Princess Leia in Star Wars
en-US.name: Movie Kudos
en-US.description: Movie Kudos lets you learn about who worked on a movie, and what their role was.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say 'Alexa, thank the crew from Star Wars' or one of the example phrases. Please try movies and roles that do not exist as well.
